description: Charlie visits the local stripclub where Ivy and Janay dance and tries to jerk off while watching! Disgusted by his actions these two pissed off strippers pull him on to the stage and make him strip for them using floggers as an incentive! Bored by his whining and low pain tolerance they hang him upside down and fuck his face and ass simultaneously before letting him down and beating him some more!!!
title: Charlie Hustle, Ivy and Janay
